title: "Bot Alert Wallpapers"
content: Bot Alert Wallpapers is a website that provides a collection of wallpapers featuring simple graphics of virtual assistants and chatbots. These wallpapers have ample space for messages and alerts, making them ideal for users who want to stay on top of their notifications while also adding a touch of personality to their desktop or mobile device. With a variety of designs to choose from, Bot Alert Wallpapers has something for everyone, whether you're looking for a cute and whimsical bot or a sleek and modern virtual assistant. Upgrade your wallpaper game and never miss an important message again with Bot Alert Wallpapers.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a simple graphic of a virtual assistant or chatbot, with space for messages and alerts."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
